NASIStools 0.0.0.9006
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Get NASIS metadata entries for specific domains or choices

    get_NASIS_metadata.Rd

    Get NASIS metadata entries for specific domains or choices

    get_NASIS_metadata(x, what = "ColumnPhysicalName", dsn = NULL)

    Arguments

    x

    Vector to match in NASIS metadata

    what

    Column to match x against. Default "ColumnPhysicalName"; alternate options include "DomainID", "DomainName", "DomainRanked", "DisplayLabel", "ChoiceSequence", "ChoiceValue", "ChoiceName", "ChoiceLabel", "ChoiceObsolete", "ChoiceDescription", "ColumnLogicalName"

    dsn

    passed to soilDB:::.get_NASIS_metadata() for alternate NASIS database connection types (path to SQLite file or open DBIConnection)

    Value

    a data.frame containing selected NASIS metadata sorted first on DomainID and then on ChoiceSequence

    Examples

    get_NASIS_metadata("texcl")
#> Error : nanodbc/nanodbc.cpp:1021: 00000: [unixODBC][Driver Manager]Data source name not found and no default driver specified
